topic.title: Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN)
topic.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Yes, the resources are served within the domain, hence decreases the overall speed of the page

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43527087/66395432-0a440500-e9f5-11e9-8e52-fd8009e369e6.png)

**Additional context**
**See the full report:** https://gtmetrix.com/reports/zeronet.io/m9viQuBW

1604067539_mirrored_realabbas_github.body: I understand the concern, but the images and other public files can be served from CDN
